name: Bolts
description:
Welcome to Bolts - a game made by Jokatin and Bulf for the Wowie Jam 4.0! You play as a tiny engineer trying to keep his machine running. If you stop supplying it with the right parts, it's game over. (Use Fullscreen.)

Just in case you didn't know:

The "Bolt" is the hexagon shaped part, the "Nut" is the circular part, and the "Screw" is the thing that looks like a capital T. (We got these so wrong lol)

Controls: Arrow keys to move.

Music generated by AI from Mubert.

Art made with Vectr.

Sound Effect from Pixabay

o- o
